home.title3: For Contracting and General Services, with
home.subtitle: In contracting and heavy transport, we provide integrated solutions for transporting liquid and dry materials, fuel, excavation and demolition works, and road and service project maintenance.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.description: Al Raad Baras Contracting and Transport Company is a private Yemeni company operating in the field of general contracting and heavy transportation services since 1983. Originally established as part of Al Naseem Transport and Contracting Office, the company became independent in 2011, providing its services throughout the Republic of Yemen and abroad. The company relies on a highly experienced and specialized Yemeni workforce, committed to international standards and adhering to all occupational safety procedures. Its workers are subject to continuous supervision during the execution of assigned tasks.

carousels.title: Heavy Transport Equipment
carousels.description: Specialized trucks for transporting various materials such as sand, gravel, cement, and steel with high efficiency and speed.

carousels.title: Hydraulic Excavators
carousels.description: Equipped with the latest technology for precise soil excavation, digging, and mining with guaranteed efficiency.

carousels.title: Heavy-Duty Haul Trucks
carousels.description: Equipped to transport large volumes of sand, gravel, and raw materials smoothly and accurately under any weather conditions.

carousels.title: Fuel & Liquid Transport Fleet
carousels.description: We provide a comprehensive fleet of specialized tankers for transporting fuel, water, and industrial liquids with the highest standards of safety and efficiency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Creating new job opportunities, absorbing specialized cadres, and contributing to the development of infrastructure and logistics services in Yemen.

values.title: Safety & Environment
values.description: Commitment to safety and environmental protection.

services.slogan: We offer a comprehensive range of specialized contracting and transportation services to meet all your project needs.
services.regional_scope: Regional operations across various areas in the Republic of Yemen and internationally.

list.title: Transportation of Liquid and Dry Materials
list.description: We provide specialized transport solutions for petroleum products, heavy, and agricultural equipment, even in the most challenging conditions.

list.title: Road Maintenance and Paving
list.description: The company executes maintenance and paving works for main and secondary roads, and rock transportation, ensuring infrastructure sustainability.

list.title: Tractor and Logistics Provision
list.description: We offer comprehensive logistics solutions, including transport, warehousing, and line security under all conditions.

list.title: Building and Construction Projects
list.description: Providing integrated solutions in construction, project management, and maintenance for buildings and service facilities.

features: Over 40 years of accumulated experience. (Operation began in 1983).
A fully equipped fleet for heavy transport.
Strict commitment to safety standards and environmental sustainability.
A specialized Yemeni staff and efficient and reliable management.

projects.slogan: Discover a selection of the most important and largest projects we have successfully executed across the Republic.

cards.title: Oil Company Station Fuel Transport
cards.description: A contract for transporting necessary fuels for the Oil Company station between Shabwah and Marib.
feature: The contract spans 3 years, serving the government sector.

cards.title: Saudi Grant Fuel Transport
cards.description: A contract for transporting fuel under the Saudi Grant program to support the energy sector in Aden regions.
feature: The contract spans 3 years, serving the Saudi support program.

cards.title: Aden Main Power Plant Fuel Transport
cards.description: A long-term contract to transport petroleum materials required to operate the Aden Main Power Plant.
feature: The contract spans 5 years, serving the most critical power plant in the interim capital.

cards.title: Economic Corporation Foodstuff Transport
cards.description: A contract for transporting food supplies for the Economic Corporation.
feature: The contract spans one year, serving the government sector.

cards.title: IMEX B Hook French Co. Equipment Transport
cards.description: A contract for transporting heavy equipment for the French oil company IMEX B Hook.
feature: The contract spans 3 years, serving the foreign sector, a partnership with a major international company.

cards.title: Lawdar Power Plant Fuel Transport
cards.description: A contract for transporting necessary fuels to operate the Lawdar Power Plant.
feature: The contract spans one year, serving the government sector.

info.title: Contact Information
info.main_branch: Main Branch: Ataq, Shabwah Governorate, Yemen
info.inquiry_slogan: Do you have any question? Contact us now to get help!

quote.title: Request a Quote Now
quote.description: We maintain complete control over our quality and project execution to offer our clients the best solutions with unmatched quality and competitive prices. At "ALRAAD," we take pride in everything we do.

footer.slogan: Your trusted partner in heavy transport services, civil contracting, and infrastructure maintenance. Accumulated experience of over 40 years in the Republic of Yemen.
